subject: [Radiance-general] Generating view file from camera calibration
body:
Just in case that you do this - do not rewrite the geometry but use an xform-statement to transform the scene. Still this is not really useful for animations, and I guess there have been enough hints for generating the view points now - so this is just for completeness ;-)

Have a nice week-end!

Lars.
